headline: Broadvoice | GoContact Names New Chief Product Officer
summary: LOS ANGELES, August 04, 2025--Broadvoice | GoContact appoints industry leader Gurdip Jande as CPO to amplify its next wave of AI-native, customer-first product innovation.

headline: HAZMAT Suits Market Forecast Report 2025-2030, with Profiles of 3M, DuPont de Nemours, Honeywell, Ansell, Dragerwerk, Kimberly-Clark, Lakeland Industries, Alpha Pro Tech, Halyard Health, and Kappler
summary: The Hazmat Suits Market is projected to grow from USD 8.778 billion in 2025 to USD 12.124 billion in 2030, at a CAGR of 6.67%. The market study explores growth drivers, technological advancements, and competitive dynamics, with North America leading and Asia Pacific emerging rapidly. Key players include DuPont and 3M. headline: Building Automation System Market Set to Double by 2030 Amid Rising IoT Integration
summary: The global building automation system market is on track to surge from USD 101.74 billion in 2025 to a projected USD 191.13 billion by 2030, registering a CAGR of 13.4%. Key growth drivers include the integration of IoT technologies, data analytics, and the rising demand for advanced surveillance and biometric systems.
